author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Tom Burns for "Catalog Edit Product Store Promos List Not Displayed" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4859
Promotion list not displayed in trunk.
Expected: List of Promotions in the "Edit Product Store Promos" section.
Note: There is no component "Catalog" in the issue field Component/s drop above.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_client__do_commit): Track which files have modifications, and send

author: gstein
msg: Switch the locks processing over to proper error parsing/handling.
(determine_error): new helper for resolving the correct error to
(handle_lock): for errors 403 and 423, switch over to processing the
body for a potential human-readable server error. drop the older
and run_one(), and use determine_error() to select the returned error.
(handle_response_cb): ensure that DONE is set if we ever see EOF
